summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, inquiring about their availability to meet on the same day. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on September 14, 2010.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The email is addressed to Jes Staley, indicating a communication between Epstein and Staley.
